title: Gyakuten Kenji - Dengeki Comic Anthology
original_name: 逆転検事―電撃コミックアンソロジー
sinopse:
Collection of manga based on the Ace Attorney spin-off game Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth (known in Japan as Gyakuten Kenji) that was published by ASCII Media Works in Japan in 2009.

(Source: aceattorney.wikia.com)
